name: kubeseal
description: Install kubeseal, the client-side utility for Kubernetes Sealed Secrets

version.description: Version of kubeseal to install. Use 'latest' for the most recent release or specify a version like '0.24.0'

sha256.description: SHA256 checksum for verification. Use 'automatic' to download checksums, 'dev-mode' to skip verification, or provide a specific checksum
